mapper.select:
select * from (
SELECT
, (select id_card_number from t_project_helmet where t_project_helmet.id = ${tableName}.helmet_id) as idCardNumber FROM ${tableName} WHERE
collect_time between #{beginTime} and #{endTime} AND helmet_id IN ( SELECT id FROM t_project_helmet WHERE project_id = #{projectId} and current_flag = 0 and is_del = 0 )
) m order by collectTime desc
